name: Guardians of RPG v1.01
description:
Guardians of RPG is a game idea that I've had since my junior year in college. Even so, I haven't gotten a chance to actually start working on it until after I graduated, which makes coming this far really surreal and encouraging. I wanted to be able to create a new version either every year or every 6 months, which is why I'm dropping whatever I have for the game during this month of January, and without the complete story of the game

I really want to hear everyone's feedback about the demo game, not only in the comment section, but also in a brief survey that I have created so that I have tangible things I can fix in the next update.

Link to survey: https://freeonlinesurveys.com/s/872MoZf0

Edit: 

Really quick before you start the game, make sure to expand it to full screen to see the entire game (I didn't realize that might be an issue until after the game was built)
